com.soen6441.core.tower

类 Tower

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.soen6441.core.map.MapItem
        • com.soen6441.core.tower.Tower
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IArchive, TimerListener
    直接已知子类:
    BottleTower, EnergyTower, IceTower, MoonTower, PoisonTower, SunTower

    public class Tower
extends MapItem
implements IArchive, TimerListener
    This class is the parent class of all types of tower classes. The class defines some common properties and methods of child tower classes. To create or upgrade a tower object should use TowerManager, which is defined by TowerManagerFactory.
    版本:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    作者:
    Haiyang Sun
    另请参阅:
    TowerManager, TowerManagerFactory

      • decode

        public void decode(org.dom4j.Element element)
        This method is used to read information from XML file and set value of properties of a tower object.
        指定者:
        decode 在接口中 IArchive
        覆盖:
        decode 在类中 MapItem
        参数:
        element - Element
        另请参阅:
        IArchive.decode(Element)

      • canUpgrade

        public boolean canUpgrade()
        This method is used to check whether the tower is in its highest level.
        返回:
        boolean
        另请参阅:
        TowerManager.canUpgrade(Tower)

      • upgrade

        public void upgrade()
        This method is used to upgrade the level of a specific tower. Call TowerManager to upgrade this tower.
        另请参阅:
        TowerManager.upgrade(Tower)
